room_title: Escape room "Hopeless" by Corky's Gaming Bistro in Dallas-Fort Worth
room_address: 3520 Grapevine Mills Blvd N Grapevine, TX 76051
room_description: You were driving home late one night and your car broke down. A local nurse named Emily was driving by and offered to take you to use her phone to call for help. After agreeing to go back to her house you quickly realize that she is not as innocent as she first seemed. You try to leave Emilyâ€™s house and realize that you have been locked in. You discover you are not her first victim and begin to uncover clues left behind by the author she previously kidnapped. She has trapped you in her home and left to run some errands. Can you escape before you learn how far she will go to keep you there?
